headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Keep the Party Going with Nightclub Business Bonuses
content:
This week its great news for moguls operating a Nightclub in GTA Online, with Promotion Missions resulting in twice as much Popularity as usual, while youâ€™ll receive a 50% bonus on Daily Income deposited into your Safe. Meanwhile, the speed of Warehouse Goods Production is doubled, meaning shorter turnaround times between big sales.

To purchase a Nightclub head to the Maze Bank site through the Internet option of your Mobile Phone.
